sentence.Network_en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentence.Network_cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentence.Network_en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentence.Network_cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

sentence.Network_en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negativeor in questions]to any further extent; any longer

lj.lj_ly: she refused to listen any more.
she refused to listen any more.

phrase.cizu_name: any time (day 或 minute 等) now

lj.lj_ly: we'll get them back any day now.
lj.lj_ls: 我们很快就能带他们回来。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)不愿合作的，不肯配合的

lj.lj_ly: I tried to make polite conversation, but he wasn't having any.
lj.lj_ls: 我尽量礼貌地同他谈一谈，可他不愿意配合。

lj.lj_ly: I tried to make polite conversation, but he wasn't having any.
lj.lj_ls: 我尽量礼貌地同他谈一谈，可他不愿意配合。

jx.jx_en_mean: a particular or special thing of its type rather than any ordinary one of that type

lj.lj_ly: he had an acting job at last, and not just any part, but the lead in a new film.
lj.lj_ls: 他最终获得了一份演出的工作，可不是担任一般的角色，而是新影片的主角。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  ǣnig (see one, -y),of Germanic origin; related to Dutch eenig and German einig

encyclopedia.content: 函数简介 函数功能：判断数组中元素是否为0 语法格式： B = any(A) 判断数组中元素是否是一个非零元素或逻辑1（true）。any函数会忽略掉数组中的NaN项（not a number）。 如果A是空的，any(A)返回逻辑0（false）。 如果A是一个向量（1行n列或n行1列的矩阵），只要A中有一个非零元素或A中有一个元素是逻辑1，any(A)返回逻辑1（true），否则（A中所有元素均为0）返回逻辑0（false）。 如果A是一个矩阵，any函数把A的每一列当做一个

entry.tran: （用于否定句）一点，丝毫，若干，任何
entry.def: You use any in statements with negative meaning to indicate that no thing or person of a particular type exists, is present, or is involved in a situation.

example.ex: I never make any big decisions...
example.tran: 我从未作过任何重大决定。

entry.tran: （用于疑问句或条件从句）若干，一点，什么，任何一个（或一些）
entry.def: You use any in questions and conditional clauses to ask whether there is some of a particular thing or some of a particular group of people, or to suggest that there might be.

example.ex: Do you speak any foreign languages?...
Are there any ladies in the audience?...

entry.def: You use any in positive statements when you are referring to someone or something of a particular kind that might exist, occur, or be involved in a situation, when their exact identity or nature is not important.

example.ex: Any actor will tell you that it is easier to perform than to be themselves...
example.tran: 每一个演员都会告诉你演戏比做自己容易。

example.ex: I'm prepared to take any advice...

entry.tran: （用于否定句中强调形容词或副词的比较级）任何，丝毫，略微，多少
entry.def: You can also use any to emphasize a comparative adjective or adverb in a negative statement.

example.ex: I can't see things getting any easier for graduates...
example.tran: 我没看出毕业生的境遇有丝毫好转。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is not just any person or thing, you mean that they are special in some way.

example.ex: Finzer is not just any East Coast businessman...
example.tran: 芬泽不是个普通的东海岸生意人。

example.ex: It's fashionable for young people to wear trainers, but not just any trainers.
example.tran: 年轻人穿旅游鞋很时尚，但不是说所有的旅游鞋都如此。

entry.def: If something does not happen or is not true any more or any longer, it has stopped happening or is no longer true.

example.ex: I don't want to see her any more...
We felt we had no home any more, no family, nothing...
example.tran: 我们觉得我们没有了家，也没有了家人，一无所有。

means.word_mean: 1. (in negative statements) either every little or very great but unspecified;

sentences.sentence: "could not endure chemotherapy for any length of time"

means.word_mean: 2. one or some or every or all without specification;

sentences.sentence: "give me any peaches you don't want"
"cars can be rented at almost any airport"
"give me whatever peaches you don't want"

auth_sentence.content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both said Iraq did not have any active WMD.

auth_sentence.content: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?

auth_sentence.content: He would never have had it any other way.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would never have had it any other way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He would never have had it any other way.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 任何的, 任何一种, 所有的

stems_affixes.word_buile: any任何的+how怎样→随便怎么样,都……

means.word_mean: 无论哪个, 无论哪些

sentences.en: He saved all the fish for his children and never tasted any himself.
sentences.cn: 他把鱼都留给孩子们, 自己一点都没有尝。

sentences.en: This is the last chance any of us has.
sentences.cn: 对于我们中的任何人来说, 这是最后的一次机会。

sentences.en: Their performance that night was better than any before.
sentences.cn: 他们那天晚上的演出比以往任何一次都好。

sentences.en: China is larger than any country in Africa.
sentences.cn: 中国比任何一个非洲国家都大。

sentences.en: There are scarcely any flies left around there.
sentences.cn: 那周围几乎没有任何苍蝇了。

sentences.en: We got there without any trouble.
Haven't you any work to do?
Come and see me if you have any time.
You can't just wear any clothes if you're going there—you have to dress very smartly.
sentences.cn: 如果你去那里, 你不能穿着普普通通的衣服, 你必须穿得很整齐漂亮。

sentences.en: I couldn't stand it any longer.
He didn't want to express himself any more strongly than he had to.
sentences.cn: 他不想更强烈地表现自己。

jushi.english: Come and see me if you have any time.
You can't just wear any clothes if you're going there—you have to dress very smartly.
jushi.chinese: 如果你去那里,你不能穿着普普通通的衣服,你必须穿得很整齐漂亮。

jushi.english: China is larger than any country in Africa.
jushi.chinese: 中国比任何一个非洲国家都大。
